an8.62:4.1: * “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:4.4: sutānañca dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti;
an8.62:4.5: dhātānañca dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.62:4.7: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:4.8: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:4.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano alaṃ paresaṃ. (1)
an8.62:5.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:5.9: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:5.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano alaṃ paresaṃ. (2)
an8.62:6.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:6.7: no ca kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:6.8: no ca sandassako hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:6.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano nālaṃ paresaṃ. (3)
an8.62:7.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ nālaṃ attano.
an8.62:7.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:7.5: no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.62:7.6: na ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.62:7.11: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano. (4)
an8.62:8.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:8.7: no ca kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:8.8: no ca sandassako hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:8.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ. (5)
an8.62:9.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano.
an8.62:9.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:9.5: no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.62:9.6: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.62:9.9: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:9.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano. (6)
an8.62:10.1: Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:10.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:10.4: no ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti;
an8.62:10.11: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ. (7)
an8.62:11.1: Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano.
an8.62:11.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:11.4: no ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti;
an8.62:11.5: no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.62:11.6: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.62:11.7: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:11.8: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:11.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano”ti. (8)
